Building Websites My Experiments with Front-end and Back-end Development

Check Out My First Post

Several months ago, I enrolled in Launch Academy which is an online bootcamp for learning web development. This blog will be a partial catalog of topics I learn.

I chose to use Jekyll for this project since it is Ruby software (which I have been learning)! After installing the Jekyll gem, I created the blog you are reading using the very nice Utterson theme from http://jekyllthemes.org/themes/utterson/.

Posted on 25 May 2016.
